episodes.title: Do As I Say Audiobook: Understanding Cults and Coercion by Sarah Steel
episodes.description:
START LISTENING NOW ► https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0B3JNK5LT?tag=odyo-20

Audio-book Do As I Say: How Cults Control, Why We Join Them, and What They Teach Us About Bullying, Abuse and Coercion 
By Sarah Steel  

Explore the powerful insights of Sarah Steel's audiobook, Do As I Say. Dive into the compelling world where belonging meets manipulation, revealing the dark dynamics behind cults and coercive behaviors.

In this eye-opening audiobook, Sarah Steel, creator of the acclaimed 'Let's Talk About Sects' podcast, uncovers the chilling truths about cults and the psychological tactics they use. With personal stories and deep research, she examines how ordinary people can fall victim to cult dynamics, delving into themes of bullying, abuse, and social psychology.

Join Sarah as she juxtaposes sensational tales of renowned cults with their underlying dynamics. Discover the human element in these narratives and learn how we can identify and break free from coercive environments. Don't miss your chance to hear this enlightening audiobook—hit play and start listening today!

Full Audiobooks Do As I Say: How Cults Control, Why We Join Them, and What They Teach Us About Bullying, Abuse and Coercion

Full audiobook by Sarah Steel
